## Repositories of Interest

### {{< fa rocket >}} vLLM - High-Throughput LLM Inference
[vllm-project/vllm](https://github.com/vllm-project/vllm) - Fast LLM inference library with PagedAttention for efficient memory management and high-throughput serving.

**Beginner Tasks:** [Good First Issues](https://github.com/vllm-project/vllm/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20label%3A%22good%20first%20issue%22) - Great starting point for new contributors.

### {{< fa zap >}} Unsloth - Ultra-Fast LLM Fine-Tuning  
[unslothai/unsloth](https://github.com/unslothai/unsloth) - Makes LLM fine-tuning 2-5x faster with 70% less memory through custom GPU kernels.

**Help Wanted:** [Open Issues](https://github.com/unslothai/unsloth/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20label%3A%22help%20wanted%22) - Community contributions welcome.

### {{< fa cloud >}} SkyPilot - Multi-Cloud Infrastructure for AI
[skypilot-org/skypilot](https://github.com/skypilot-org/skypilot) - Run AI workloads on any cloud with unified interface and automatic cost optimization.

**Good Starter Issues:** [Open Issues](https://github.com/skypilot-org/skypilot/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20label%3A%22good%20starter%20issues%22) - Perfect for getting started with contributions.
